== Alappad (627821) ==

Alappad is a village in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 572 hectares and harbouring 1112 households with total population of 4448 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 17 km. Male population is 2036 and female population is 2412. Scheduled Caste Population is 734 and Scheduled Tribes population is 4. Census Location Code of the village is 627821<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
